data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Huifeng, Yao, Zhiyuan, Song, Yang, Li, Shuqiang (2018): Taxonomic study of the Pinelemabailongensis species group with descriptions of six new species from China (Araneae, Telemidae). ZooKeys 784: 7-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.784.27758, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.784.27758
